name: Square Sphere
overview: A stimulating super Space Shuttle shooter. The game seems heavily influenced by the arcade classic, Astro Blaster. The Omega 4 Square Sphere space ship, built with new and exotic scientific techniques, was destined for the exploration of the newly discovered Zone 8, being particularly feared due to the alien forces that populate it. But an unexpected threat is headed for the eastern United States and the ship is the only one that can intervene in time! Waves of meteorites that intend to rain down on the earth and create an extinction event. Destroy all the meteorites, you are the only hope for the world. Published in Italy as New York Attack, shortened to Attak in Poke n.13 (maggio 1986).
